name: rf-pool-classifier
description: Train a random forest classifier to classify polygons in those that contain pools and those that do not.

inputPortDescriptors.name: image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the image strip where the polygons are found.

inputPortDescriptors.name: geojson
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains a geojson with labeled polygons. Each polygon has the properties feature_id, image_id, and class_name (either 'No swimming pool' or 'Swimming pool')

inputPortDescriptors.name: n_estimators
inputPortDescriptors.description: Number of trees to use in the random forest classifier. Defaults to 100.

outputPortDescriptors.name: trained_classifier
outputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the file 'classifier.pkl' which is the trained random forest classifier.
